briefTitle: Comparison of the Effects of Indacaterol and Tiotropium on Inspiratory Capacity
officialTitle: Multicenter, Randomized, Blinded, Placebo-controlled, Crossover, Single-dose Study to Assess the Effect of Indacaterol (150 μg) Versus Tiotropium (18 μg) on Inspiratory Capacity in Moderate Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients
summary: This study compared the effects of a single dose of indacaterol with that of a single dose of tiotropium on inspiratory capacity.

primaryOutcome.measure: Peak Inspiratory Capacity Assessed With Spirometry in the 4 Hours After Treatment
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 4 hour period following inhalation of study treatment
